page.title: 16TRANSPORT:_ROADS & VEHICLES.
page.content: All{ROADS}in this area have TARMACADAM surfaces.A766 is a Main Road going N.W out of Penicuik.It is 5.5m. wide and has a footpath which is 1.5m. wide. An Unclassified Road,5.5m.wide,joins the A766 with the A702 Main Trunk Road South at Silverburn.The footpath along side this road is also 1.5m.wide.The unclassified Harlaw Muir Road has a Tarmac surface laid on a Brushwood bottom because of the Bog underneath. It is 4m.wide with passing places. It joins the A701, which is the Main Scenic Road South,at Ravensneuk Farm. Bog Road,another unclassified road, joins the A766 & A701.A{Survey}of vehicles using the above roads was made and the results were as follows:_ {A766}_121 Vehicles{A701}_ 403 Vehicles {Silverburn Road} _ 12 Vehicles {Harlaw Muir Road }_ 12 Vehicles {Bog Road}_ 114 Vehicles _ In 1 hour.
